1 + @import "reset.css";
2 + @import "general.css";
3 + @import "layout.css";
4 + @import "objects.css";
5 + @import "utilities.css";
5 \ No newline at end of file

1 + /* Banner */
2 + #page-header {
3 + text-align: center;
4 + }
5 + #page-header h1 {
6 + font-family: 'Old Standard TT', serif;
7 + font-weight: bold;
8 + text-transform: uppercase;
9 + font-size: 3.6em;
10 + line-height: 1;
11 + margin: .5em;
12 + word-spacing: .2em;
13 + text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 white, 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.2);
14 + }
15 + #page-header h1 a {
16 + color: inherit;
17 + text-decoration: none;
18 + }
19 +
20 + /* Main Nav */
21 + #page-header nav {
22 + border-top: 2px solid black;
23 + border-bottom: 1px solid black;
24 + }
25 + #page-header nav ul {
26 + float: left;
27 + }
28 + #page-header nav ul li {
29 + float: left;
30 + }
31 + #page-header nav ul li a {
32 + display: block;
33 + position: relative;
34 + z-index: 1;
35 + color: inherit;
36 + text-decoration: none;
37 + padding: 10px 0;
38 + margin-right: -1px;
39 + }
40 + #page-header nav ul li a span {
41 + border-right: 1px solid #ddd;
42 + padding: 0 24px 0 25px;
43 + }
44 + #page-header nav ul li:last-child a span {
45 + border: none;
46 + padding-right: 25px;
47 + }
48 + #page-header nav ul li a:hover {
49 + background: #f6f6f6;
50 + }
51 + #page-header nav ul li a:hover span {
52 + border: none;
53 + padding-right: 25px;
54 + }
55 + #page-header nav ul li.active a {
56 + z-index: 2;
57 + background: #666;
58 + color: #f6f666;
59 + padding-bottom: 12px;
60 + margin-bottom: -2px;
61 + }
62 + #page-header nav ul li.active a span {
63 + border: none;
64 + padding-right: 25px;
65 + }
66 +
67 +
68 + /* Slide Down */
69 + #slide-down {
70 + display: none;
71 + overflow: hidden;
72 + background: #666;
73 + color: white;
74 + border-bottom: 1px solid black;
75 + }
76 + .drop {
77 + padding: 20px;
78 + }
79 +
80 + /* Main */
81 + #main {
82 + margin-top: 20px;
83 + }
84 +
85 + /* User Nav */
86 + #user-nav {
87 + position: relative;
88 + font-size: .75em;
89 + padding: 0 20px;
90 + background: #EEE;
91 + border-bottom: 1px solid #CCC;
92 + }
93 + #user-nav ul {
94 + float: right;
95 + }
96 + #user-nav ul li {
97 + float: left;
98 + }
99 + #user-nav ul li a {
100 + position: relative;
101 + z-index: 1;
102 + background: #EEE;
103 + display: block;
104 + color: inherit;
105 + text-decoration: none;
106 + padding: 10px 20px;
107 + border-left: 1px solid #CCC;
108 + border-right: 1px solid #CCC;
109 + margin-left: -1px;
110 + }
111 + #user-nav .badge {
112 + background: #f6f666;
113 + color: #000;
114 + font-weight: bold;
115 + border-radius: 5px;
116 + padding: 2px 7px;
117 + margin-left: 5px;
118 + box-shadow: inset 0 0 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.5);
119 + }
120 + #user-nav ul li.active a {
121 + z-index: 3;
122 + background: #fcfcfc;
123 + padding-bottom: 11px;
124 + margin-bottom: -1px;
125 + box-shadow: 0 -5px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.25);
126 + }
127 + #user-nav ul li .dropdown {
128 + display: none;
129 + position: absolute;
130 + z-index: 2;
131 + right: 20px;
132 + width: 33.33333%;
133 + background: #fcfcfc;
134 + border: 1px solid #CCC;
135 + box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0,0,0,.25);
136 + }
137 + #user-nav ul li.active .dropdown {
138 + display: block;
139 + }
140 +
141 + /* Article Thumbs */
142 + .article-thumbs {
143 + margin: 0 -5px;
144 + }
145 + .article-thumbs article {
146 + float: left;
147 + width: 16.66666%;
148 + }
149 + .article-thumbs article a {
150 + display: block;
151 + padding: 10px;
152 + color: inherit;
153 + text-decoration: none;
154 + -webkit-transition: background 300ms;
155 + -moz-transition: background 300ms;
156 + transition: background 300ms;
157 + }
158 + .article-thumbs article a:hover {
159 + background: rgba(255,255,255,.15);
160 + }
161 + .article-thumbs article a figure {
162 + border: 1px solid black;
163 + float: left;
164 + }
165 + .article-thumbs article a figure img {
166 + display: block;
167 + }
168 + .article-thumbs article a hgroup {
169 + clear: left;
170 + padding-top: 8px;
171 + }
172 + .article-thumbs article a h4 {
173 + color: #f6f666;
174 + font-size: .75em;
175 + text-transform: uppercase;
176 + font-weight: bold;
177 + letter-spacing: .1em;
178 + margin-bottom: 2px;
179 + }
180 + .article-thumbs article a h2 {
181 + }
182 +
183 + /* Main Article */
184 + article.main header h1 {
185 + font-size: 2.5em;
186 + }

1 + /* http://meyerweb.com/eric/tools/css/reset/
2 + v2.0 | 20110126
3 + License: none (public domain)
4 + */
5 +
6 + html, body, div, span, applet, object, iframe,
7 + h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p, blockquote, pre,
8 + a, abbr, acronym, address, big, cite, code,
9 + del, dfn, em, img, ins, kbd, q, s, samp,
10 + small, strike, strong, sub, sup, tt, var,
11 + b, u, i, center,
12 + dl, dt, dd, ol, ul, li,
13 + fieldset, form, label, legend,
14 + table, caption, tbody, tfoot, thead, tr, th, td,
15 + article, aside, canvas, details, embed,
16 + figure, figcaption, footer, header, hgroup,
17 + menu, nav, output, ruby, section, summary,
18 + time, mark, audio, video {
19 + margin: 0;
20 + padding: 0;
21 + border: 0;
22 + font-size: 100%;
23 + font: inherit;
24 + vertical-align: baseline;
25 + }
26 + /* HTML5 display-role reset for older browsers */
27 + article, aside, details, figcaption, figure,
28 + footer, header, hgroup, menu, nav, section {
29 + display: block;
30 + }
31 + body {
32 + line-height: 1;
33 + }
34 + ol, ul {
35 + list-style: none;
36 + }
37 + blockquote, q {
38 + quotes: none;
39 + }
40 + blockquote:before, blockquote:after,
41 + q:before, q:after {
42 + content: '';
43 + content: none;
44 + }
45 + table {
46 + border-collapse: collapse;
47 + border-spacing: 0;
48 + }

1 + /* Clearfix - see http://nicolasgallagher.com/micro-clearfix-hack/ */
2 + .group:before,
3 + .group:after {
4 + content: " ";
5 + display: table;
6 + }
7 + .group:after {
8 + clear: both;
9 + }
10 + .group {
11 + *zoom: 1;
12 + }
12 \ No newline at end of file

475 + <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, sit quem fabulas recusabo eu, ea quod definiebas his. Ut justo repudiare pertinacia quo, eum libris meliore dignissim no. Sint inimicus assueverit vis te. Nam ei quando aliquam tibique, debet senserit voluptatum cu quo.</p>
476 + <p>Duo augue error vocibus cu. Ius docendi posidonium ei, cum mundi ponderum cu, postea philosophia ad est. His eu nihil ceteros noluisse, ad sea facilis omittantur. Tota iriure ex sit, eum erant assentior voluptaria ut, lucilius patrioque quo no. In vis quod vide noster. Autem mucius copiosae cu pri, aeque graece est ut.</p>
477 + <p>Eum ne maiorum referrentur, et eos brute adolescens. Omnis soleat erroribus est in, eos eu diceret pertinax. Eu mei essent posidonium, in erant petentium cum. Mei id feugait interpretaris, usu vide assum audire id. Te usu eruditi dolores electram, diceret tibique in sit.</p>
478 + <p>Cum erat fugit oratio cu, eos ei wisi ullum. Eam ex tale dicam, diam persius suscipit an nam, ad mei erroribus maluisset. Ius ne dicant aeterno inciderint, vim ea case ullum. Vel accusata abhorreant et. Vis an officiis fabellas, mea eros vivendo adolescens ad.</p>
479 + <p>Sumo sonet feugait ex nec, ex wisi novum tantas eum. Amet consetetur id sea, facer harum menandri te vix. Ex luptatum accommodare interpretaris cum, in has ornatus indoctum explicari. steps.lesson:
remove automatic hiding.

I don't like that the parent is being hidden so I'm going to unhide it and then hide all the invidual sectiosn because that's what we really care about.

diffs.html:
1 + $(document).ready(function() {
2 + // I don't like that the parent is being hidden so I'm going to unhide it.
3 + $('#slide-down').show();
4 + // all sections are childen of #slide-down so to start we should hide them all.
5 + $('#slide-down section').hide();
6 + });

diffs.html:

18 18
19 - if( visible ) {
20 - $('#' + name + '-drop').toggle();
19 + // jQuery selectors (visible) always return an Array, but it may be empty so we need to check.
20 + if( visible.length > 0 ) {
21 +
22 + // All sections have classNames that identify themselves so let's check that.
23 + // This answers the question:
24 + // "is the visible section the section that we are trying to toggle?"
25 + if(visible.hasClass(name)) {
26 + // if the visible section is the one being toggled
27 + // then we need to use the slideDown to achieve a nicer effect.
28 + $('#' + name + '-drop').slideToggle(150);
29 + }
30 + else {
31 + // Toggle is the same as hide() and show() just toggled.
32 + $('#' + name + '-drop').toggle();
33 + }
34 34 }
